title: Drawing, "Cloud Study", 1844
inscribed:
Upper right:  "Aug 6 1844" 
Top:  " 1 orange brilliant / 2 whitish yellow quite bright / 3 a flat cloud - the color - a sort of indescribable cool purplish grey the sky no color at all somewhat darker than / 4 blue sky / 5 cold - bluish - 6 light to 5 cold - whitish / 7 this cloud is red and quite bright at the top fading into the main cloud."
description: Cloud studies. Verso: Standing figure and back of cow's head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cloud Study", 1844.
1844. Graphite on buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1425.
